name: Jackhammer Joe
description:
Welcome to Jackhammer Joe! This game is action platformer, where after falling deeper, ever deeper into a cave, you finally manage to get your grounding, and try to escape. This leads to 5 levels of platforming madness, where armed with only a Jackhammer, you must escape!

This game has 2 ways to play each level:

Escape the Cave: Solve the platforming challenge, and move on to the next screen 

Collect and Combo: Kill everything, drill everything, to gain gems and rack up a combo! These stats are shown when you die, and offer a nice sense of self-satisfaction (if this stuff self-satisfies you, otherwise you can just feel like the pro gamer you are), as well as giving a new harder twist on each level. 

There are 2 Major Bugs to be fixed: 

1. Screen shake just doesn’t happen. At all. And it is supposed to

2. Originally a rogue mode was planned, and I even got chunks and implementation for it done, but it was too buggy for me to launch the game with, so after fixing up its issues, I will release it, and deem this Jam Version complete

THIS IS THE JAM VERSION OF JACKHAMMER JOE! 

A mobile/steam version is planned to be released late 2021, with new areas, new enemies, new ores, and a base to explore + so much more! Stay tuned for updates on that, and follow my socials for the most frequent updates:
